review:
the best movie ever!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!
why would anyone hate it? i love the songs and the story is just awesome i wish i could tell harman baweja personally that he did the best stunts, dancing, and acting. you guys should watch the movie who did not yet!!!!!
i liked the couple & the romance and the sensibility of missing n finding someone special. though movie could have been made better. any way i watched this movie in theatre and enjoyed the effects.
